duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality customer service and represent the company in a positive and professional manner.
Conduct appointment setting for automotive dealerships nationwide.
Effectively communicate using proper English and grammar in one-on-one and team environments.
Navigate dual-screen, multi-tab, multiple platform programs while guiding phone conversations.
Take notes during calls of relevant points for the dealership.
Maintain a quiet work environment free from background noise.
Be efficient in computer navigation skills and provide above-average efficiency.
